title: How to Optimize the Configurations of Your Steam Server

steps.headline: When starting the Dedicated Server, if you have windows and your are running the server from the GUI (the default option), you will be prompted a window in which you can change various constants.
steps.description: The Maximum Players constant should be selected according to the result of this formula:Bandwidth in Kbps / (sv_maxrate / 128) = Recommended Number of Slots Use 192 instead of 128 for SRCDS (Source Dedicated Servers).

steps.headline: Edit [with notepad] the server.cfg in the server's directory (X:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\steamapps\ServerOwner\dedicated server\ChosenGame\server.cfg).
Set your sv_maxrate to a multiple of 128 between 3072-6144.
Set your sv_maxupdaterate to sv_maxrate/ 256.
steps.description: Set a round number, no need to be too precise.

text: Set up a Steam Server  When starting the Dedicated Server, if you have windows and your are running the server from the GUI (the default option), you will be prompted a window in which you can change various constants. The Maximum Players constant should be selected according to the result of this formula:Bandwidth in Kbps / (sv_maxrate / 128) = Recommended Number of Slots Use 192 instead of 128 for SRCDS (Source Dedicated Servers). Start the server.  Edit [with notepad] the server.cfg in the server's directory (X:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\steamapps\ServerOwner\dedicated server\ChosenGame\server.cfg).  Set your sv_maxrate to a multiple of 128 between 3072-6144. "Anything above that is gravy." (SMPM-Sniper) Set your sv_maxupdaterate to sv_maxrate/ 256. Set a round number, no need to be too precise.
